titles.title: Castle Pines Community Act
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Castle Pines, Colorado, and for other purposes.
Castle Pines Community Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Castle Pines Community Act
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Castle Pines, Colorado.
